title: cafter
author: cafter
content: Reddit bitcoin community vs bitcoin talk forum communityreddit have more members than bitcointalk, and what do you think?

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: Reddit is overrated, too noisy and messy, so many extra stuff which only distract you. This forum is the home of bitcoin, we are kind of a family with satoshi as the founder of this home.

comments.author: cafter
comments.body: Quote from: digaran on March 11, 2023, 05:34:32 PMReddit is overrated, too noisy and messy, so many extra stuff which only distract you. This forum is the home of bitcoin, we are kind of a family with satoshi as the founder of this home. also, reddit have very confusing layout, with lot of irrelevant stuff, people only comment like this yes,i love it, fu*k you,this is my favourite,me too, etc , no learning comments,bitcointalk is my first ever forum is made an account, I don't know very much about other forums so i made this thread.

comments.author: Car22
comments.body: Reddit community has own importance as well as bitcoin community. Red community has its own rules and bitcoin community has its own rules. So I think Bitcoin talk Forum Community is much better than reddit community.
